about_the_game:
[LOCATE YOUR DLC ONCE DOWNLOADED]

Walkthrough added to the game's Steam directory after purchase. The default location is:

\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Amnesia\Walkthrough

If this is not valid, locate your game's install directory using these instructions:

- Open the Steam client and navigate to your game library
- Right-click the entry for "Amnesia" and select Properties
- Click the Local Files tab
- Click Browse Local Files

With this guide, you can get help with:
  • Finding every hidden images
  • Unlocking every achievement
  • Unlocking every HOT scenes
  • Finding out how your choices will affect different scenes in the game

content_descriptors.notes: The manual depicts sex, scenes of a sexual nature, alcohol and drugs.
